vselbig.c File Reference

vselbig - select largest component in a labelled image. More...

Detailed Description

vselbig - select largest component in a labelled image.

Description
The input image must be of type "ubyte" or "short". The output image will be of type "bit" and contain only those pixels which belong to the most frequent class.
Usage
vselbig
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
Examples

Known bugs
none.
